altTitles.ja: 友人の妹

description.en: The long awaited new series from Shima Tokio, an irregular boy meets girl story. Please enjoy this extraordinarily sweet romantic comedy.

Enoch Latraki loves his wife, Juliet, even though she doesn’t love him back. But one day, she suddenly changes, becoming gentle and kind. Enoch is determined to find out why his wife has become so affectionate.

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

altTitles.ja: うわこい

description.de: Seitdem ein Feuer in seiner Kindheit sein Haus vernichtete, lebt Yukiteru mit den Freunden seiner Familie, Yuno und ihrer älteren Schwester Yomi zusammen. Sie leben ihr Leben, bis eine Klassenkameradin namens Rena, welche eifersüchtig auf die enge Freundschaft zwischen Yukiteru und Yuno ist, einen überraschenden Schritt in Form eines Liebes-Geständnisses und eines Kusses macht. Was wird Yukiteru tun? Sich auf Rena einlassen oder wird er sich doch für Yuno entscheiden?
description.en: Yukiteru is living with his family friend Yuno after a fire burnt down his home as a child. They live their life until a fellow classmate Rena who is jealous of their close friendship makes a surprise move.

The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

altTitles.ja: ふだつきのキョーコちゃん

description.en:
Fudatsuki Kenji is known in his school for two things: for being a delinquent and a siscon. He constantly follows his little sister Kyoko around, fixing her giant ribbon, and chasing off any boys who might be interested in her.   
However, the truth is much stranger than what people believe: he doesn't actually have a crush on his sister. In fact, he likes Hibino, the only girl in his class who isn't afraid of him.
description.ru:
Фудацуки Кэндзи уже давно в школе считают хулиганом и сестролюбом. Причиной тому стало то, что он круглосуточно следит за своей сестрой Кёко, её гигантской лентой в волосах и отпугивает парней, которые заинтересованы в девушке. А ещё Кэндзи влюблен в Хибино-сан, единственную девушку, которая его не боится.   
Истина же в том, что его сестра буквально монстр. Она цзянши, то есть вампир — поэтому она гораздо сильнее человека и ей нужно пить кровь Кэндзи. Кёко носит ленту в волосах, которая сдерживает её аппетит и сильно влияет на личность своей хозяйки.  
Удастся ли Кэндзи сдержать в секрете силы своей сестры и получится ли что-нибудь с девушкой его мечты, Хибино-сан?
description.pt-br: Fudatsuki Kenji é conhecido na escola por duas coisas: por ser um delinquente e por ter um complexo de irmã. Ele sempre está grudado em sua irmã, Kyoko para cuidar dela e fazer de tudo que seu laço não se desfaça. O que acabou gerando uma fofoca em toda a escola que tem uma tara pela própria irmã.O que é uma grande mentira, ele não tem tara nenhuma pela irmã, mas tem um motivo para se protetor e principalmente com o laço dela, pois se o laço for desfeito algo de ruim pode acontecer. o que seria?

altTitles.ja: そんな家族なら捨てちゃえば?

altTitles.vi: Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không?

altTitles.en: Is A Family Like This Worth Keeping?
If It's A Family Like That, Why Don't You Throw It Away?

description.en: "My wife made a rule for our home: 'Don't talk to Dad.'" "Isn't that domestic violence? Weren't you sending me an SOS for help?" Reitarou Shinotani has been long ignored by his wife and daughter, left all alone, and forced to do nothing but eat and sleep in a small, dark, cramped room in the house. What fate awaits him, as he aims to revitalize his family...?
description.vi:
Bị vợ và con gái lạnh nhạt, Shinoya Reitaro buộc phải sinh hoạt trong cô độc ngay trong chính căn nhà của mình. 
"Không được bước qua ranh giới, 
Không được ăn uống chung, 
Không được dùng nhà vệ sinh, 
Không được bắt chuyện, 
Không được tạo ra tiếng ồn khi đóng/mở cửa..." 
Cho đến khi anh gặp được một người phụ nữ mà anh không nhớ rõ đã từng gặp qua ở đâu. 
"Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không? Sao anh không vứt quách nó cho rồi đi?" 
Liệu số phận của người đàn ông đang đứng giữa hai sự lựa chọn này rồi sẽ ra sao?

altTitles.ja: シュガーレス

description.en: Shiiba Gaku wants to be the boss of Kushima High, which is popularly known as “Windmill”. In order to become number one, he has to face many challenges because the school is full of tough opponents. Just as he decides to take the fist step, an afro-looking guy interrupts him. What will happen from now on? Will he be able to realize his dream?

altTitles.ja: ウルトラマン

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Kazuo Umezu's "Ultraman" was serialized at the same time as the 1966 TV broadcast!　The fierce battles with popular monsters such as the Baltan and Mefilas aliens are fully recorded along with the color pages from the serialization and the chapter covers!

Kazuo Umezu's very famous manga adaptation of the first Ultraman series.

The Day To Day Life of Magical Girl and The Right Hand-Man of an Evil Empire.

description.pt-br: Esse mangá conta a história do dia-a-dia de uma garota mágica e o mão direita do Rei demônio de um império maligno. Ambos são inimigos, mas o Oficial acaba se apaixonando pela garota mágica. O que será que vai acontecer nessa história?

altTitles.en: Date a Live - Touka Dead End
デート・ア・ライブ 十香デッドエンド

description.en: In a zombie apocalypse, a woman relentlessly fights for the search for new clothes so fiercely that the zombies begin to organize for better living conditions, on the other hand, a zombie with a high level of cooking wisely chooses its prey, demanding the seal. friboi, and as fate would have it, these two end up becoming lovers.
description.pt-br: Em um apocalipse zumbi, uma mulher luta implacavelmente pela busca por novas roupas de maneira tão feroz que os zumbies começam a se organizar por melhores condições de vida, em contra partida, um zumbi com alto nível de culinária escolhe sabiamente suas presas, exigindo o selo friboi, e por zueira do destino, esses dois acabam se tornando namorados.

altTitles.fr: À la poursuite de Luce Vischel

altTitles.ja: ルーク・ビシェルの攻略法

altTitles.th: ภารกิจไล่ตามลุค บีเชล

description.en:
Bastian Effenberg, the best duke in the world who had nothing to fear.
She declares that she will marry the kingdom's top monster hunter, Luke Bischel, who is the exact opposite of her! The marriage of two people who are opposites, can it really go smoothly?

---
With wealth, status, and incredibly good looks, the only thing Bastian Effenberg is missing is a decent personality. But who needs one of those when the queen is your cousin and the whole world bows at your feet? Of course, even a noble pain in everyone's side needs to be disciplined once in a while. And that's what Bastian's parents thought they were doing when they threatened to marry him off to Luke Vischel, the ferocious knight of everyone's nightmares. Luke may have been the only person Bastian ever feared, but that is precisely how she captured his heart. Now, Bastian is determined to conquer the woman who once sent chills up his spine, but is he any match for her? This pompous heir is certainly a force to be reckoned with, but if anyone can tame him, it's her.
description.ko:
세상 두려울 게 없던 왕국에서 제일 가는 공작가의 망나니 '바스티안 에펜베르크'.
자신과 정반대인 왕국 최고 마물사냥꾼 '루크 비셸'과 결혼하겠다고 선언한다!
모든 게 반대인 두 사람의 결혼, 과연 평탄할 수 있을 것인가?

title.en: Kimi to Nara Koi wo Shite Mite mo

altTitles.ja: 君となら恋をしてみても

altTitles.en: I Could Fall in Love with You

description.en:
Thanks to a past trauma, Amane, a high school student, has given up on the idea of seriously loving anyone.

On the first day of his new life in Enoshima, he met Ryuuji, a boy his age. Ryuuji happened to be Amane's type and he'd also like to hang out with him more. But what started out with light feelings is now beginning to change into something unexpected...
description.ja: 過去のトラウマから真剣に人を好きになることをやめた高校生の天(あまね)は、江ノ島での新生活初日、同い年の龍司(りゅうじ)に出会う。好みの見た目だし一緒に遊びたいなと軽い気持ちだったのに、感情は思わぬほうへ動きだして…？

altTitles.en: A Gypsy's Trick to the Duke

altTitles.th: รักวุ่นวายของนายหญิงกำมะลอ

description.de:
Silvia Lauren ist die Herzogin von Aswan und die Frau des blutrünstigen Kriegsfanatikers und Herzogs Victor Aswan. Sie ist außerdem seit Kurzem schwanger mit Victors erstem Kind. Zumindest ist das die Fassade, die sie erschaffen hat, um sich ihren Platz im Anwesen des Herzogs zu erschleichen, während dieser auf einem weit entfernten Schlachtfeld um Ruhm und Ehre kämpft. Aber als Victor viel früher als erwartet aus dem Krieg zurückkehrt, gerät Silvias Vorhaben ins Wanken. Anstatt sie allerdings in hohem Bogen aus dem Haus zu werfen, entscheidet sich Victor dazu, bei ihrem Plan mitzuspielen und erwartet voller Freude – oder besser: Schadenfreude – die Geburt seines nicht existenten Kindes. Wie lange wird Silvia es schaffen, ihre Lügen aufrechtzuerhalten und an der Seite des Herzogs zu bleiben?

---

description.en:
Silvia Lauren is the duchess of the Aswan estate and the wife of the bloodthirsty war addict, Duke Victor Aswan. She is also one-month pregnant with Victor's first child. At least, that's the façade she has created in order to secretly reside in the duke's castle while he is away fighting in a war. But when Victor returns from battle much earlier than anticipated, Silvia fears that her intricate lies will all come to light. However, instead of throwing her out of his home right away, Victor decides to go along with her scheme and happily awaits the birth of his nonexistent child—and by happily, it's more like threateningly. How long will Silvia be able to keep up with her lies and remain by the ruthless duke's side?

---

description.fr:
Silvia Lauren est la duchesse d'Aswan et l'épouse du duc Victor Aswan, un fanatique de guerre assoiffé de sang. Elle est également enceinte d'un mois du premier enfant de Victor. En tout cas, telle est l'histoire qu'elle a créée de toutes pièces afin de résider en secret dans la demeure du duc alors que celui-ci est parti au front. Mais lorsque Victor revient du champ de bataille beaucoup plus tôt que prévu, Silvia craint que son mensonge n'éclate au grand jour. Toutefois, plutôt que de la renvoyer de sa demeure sur-le-champ, Victor décide de jouer le jeu et déclare d'un ton joyeux (ou plutôt extrêmement menaçant) attendre avec impatience la naissance de son enfant fictif. Combien de temps Silvia pourra-t-elle continuer à mentir et rester aux côtés de l'impitoyable duc?

description.id:
Duke kami, yang datang tahun lalu, kembali tanpa sekarat. Sylvia, seorang bangsawan miskin, meninggalkan rumahnya untuk menghindari pernikahan yang tidak diinginkan. Tempat Sylvia membuat rumah barunya adalah fanatik Dukes of War, Victor Aswan. Dikabarkan sebagai pembunuh yang kejam, dia ditakdirkan untuk berlama-lama dalam pertempuran selama 20 tahun ke depan. Sudah sebulan sejak Sylvia bahagia di Kastil Duke sambil berpura-pura menjadi pengantin Victor. "Kamu bilang kamu punya anakku?" Duke, yang telah pergi selama tujuh tahun, tiba-tiba kembali.

description.ko:
<사기치다 걸려서 결혼해버렸습니다.>

빚만 남기고 죽어버린 아버지, 계모와 이복 동생의 구박에 견디다 못한 실비아 로렌은 가출 후 전쟁광 아스완 공작성에 숨어든다.
공작 빅터가 출정 나간 탓에 7년 동안 방치 되 온 공작성. 눈치 빠른 실비아는 오는 길에 적군의 습격을 받았다는 거짓말과 함께 아스완 공작의 하나뿐인 아이를 임신한 아내인 척 연기한다.
그렇게 공작 부인으로 살던 어느날, 전쟁터에서 아스완 공작이 죽지 않고 살아 돌아오는데! 실비아를 쫓아내기는 커녕 그녀의 사기행각을 눈감아 주는 빅터. 무시무시한 전쟁광의 공작성에서 과연 실비아 로렌의 운명은?

---

description.pt-br: Silvia Lauren é a duquesa da propriedade de Aswan e a esposa do viciado em guerra sanguinário, Duque Victor Aswan. Ela também está grávida de um mês do primeiro filho de Victor. Pelo menos, essa é a mentira que ela criou para residir secretamente no castelo do duque enquanto ele está lutando em uma guerra. Mas quando Victor retorna da batalha muito mais cedo do que o previsto, Silvia teme que suas mentiras venham à tona.

altTitles.en: Grandpa Samurai and Granddaughter of the Supreme

description.en: Just when Liu Jinshan thought he could die without regrets, his family was annihilated! As a result, he became determined to live just so that he could see his only surviving granddaughter, Liu Seol, reach adulthood. As he struggled to raise her and train her with his aging body, Liu Seol, who was born with the talent of a supreme martial artist, grew up much faster than he thought she would. "Don't worry, Grandpa, I'll protect you from now on!"

altTitles.ja: イレギュラーズ

description.en:
We may be like this, but if we don't give up, we will surely reach the dream stage, Koshien!"

Jyosei Private Academy. After it changed its policy and became a cut-throat academic elite school, its once powerful baseball team has become weak with only four members left. However, baseball maniac Ruito Hibino has a secret plan!

Aiming for Koshien is an amateur tag-team of misfits!?

Straight from the bottom of hell!

A straightforward tale of baseball played by hated people!

altTitles.zh: 顶级气运，悄悄修炼千年

altTitles.en: Top Tier Providence- Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years
Top Tier Providence: Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years

description.en:
Being reincarnated in a cultivation world, Han Jue realizes that he can live his life like a video game. He can reroll his cultivation potential and connate providence.

So, he spends 11 years rerolling for a good one…

[Unparalleled: Immortal beauty, top-notch charm]

[Destined Sword fanatic: Top-notch Sword Dao aptitude, top-notch Sword Dao comprehension]

[Unparalleled Movement Technique: Top-notch movement technique aptitude]

[Descendant of the Immortal Emperor: You will receive an unparalleled cultivation technique and 1,000 superior-grade spirit stones]

In pursuit of longevity, Han Jue decides to cultivate in a low-profile manner.
A thousand years later, generations of cultivators have become history.

That is when beings of the fairyland start cleansing the mortal world. Han Jue can no longer hide and has no choice but to take action.

Then he realizes, that deities and gods aren’t that powerful after all!

title.en: Eroge Sekai ni Tensei Shita ore ga, Oshi e no ai de Netorare Hiroin o Shiawaseni Suru.

altTitles.ja: エロゲ世界に転生した俺が、推しへの愛で寝取られヒロインを幸せにする。

altTitles.ja-ro: Eroge Sekai ni Tensei Shita ore ga, Oshi e no ai de Netorare Hiroin o Shiawaseni Suru.

altTitles.en: "I, who was reincarnated into the world of eroge, will make the NTR heroine happy with my love"

description.en:
"Suck it nicely, you weakling!"
The one servicing that bastard's thing was my beloved girlfriend. There was nothing I could do before that scene...

After starting to play an erotic game recommended by a friend, Mitsuki falls head over heels in love with the game's main heroine, Kotoha.
But this game is a NTR game in which the heroine is seduced by the player's best friend, Ryo?!

While searching for a happy ending with Kotoha, Mitsuki accidentally falls onto the train platform.
When he wakes up, he finds himself faced with none other than... Kotoha!?
To his surprise, Mitsuki has been reincarnated as the player character of "that" game...!

With his vast knowledge and love of games, Mitsuki is determined to change fate this time.
In order to protect Kotoha and the others from Ryo, he must achieve a perfect happy ending!
description.ja:
「上手にしゃぶれよザコ×××！」
クソ野郎のアレに奉仕するのは俺の大好きな彼女。その光景を前に俺は何もできず…。

友人の薦めでとあるエロゲーを始めた光希は、作品のメインキャラ・古都葉にガチ恋をする。
だがこのゲーム、ヒロインがプレイヤーの親友キャラ・凌に堕とされる寝取られゲーで！？

古都葉との幸せな結末を探し求める中、誤って駅のホームに転落してしまう光希。
目覚めた彼の眼前にいたのは、他でもない…古都葉！？
なんと光希は「あの」ゲームのプレイヤーキャラに転生したのだった…！

膨大なゲーム知識と愛で、今度こそ運命を変えようと決意する光希。
凌から古都葉たちを守り抜き、完全無欠のハッピーエンドを迎えるために――！

altTitles.ja: エンジェル・ハート
エンジェル・ハート 1stシーズン

description.en:
A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building, and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously, her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams, which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart, who happens to be Kaori Makimura, former partner of City Hunter.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics
description.ja: 台湾の黒社会組織の殺人兵器として養成された少女グラス・ハート。彼女は自殺を図るが、シティーハンターのパートナー槇村香の心臓を移植され一命をとりとめる。蘇ったグラス・ハートは組織を抜け出し、香の記憶に導かれるように新宿・リョウの元へ。やがて二人は香の心臓という絆で、再会をはたすのだが……!?
description.es-la: Una joven asesina taiwanesa con el nombre clave de "Corazón de Cristal" se suicidó saltando desde un edificio, y su corazón fue atravesado por una valla metálica. Milagrosamente, su vida se salvó gracias a un trasplante de corazón. Durante su recuperación comenzó a experimentar extraños sueños, que la llevaron a Japón en busca del donante de su corazón, que resulta ser Kaori Makimura, antigua compañera de City Hunter.

description.en:
Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo da venda de informações sobre monstros, Maeng Siwoo é considerado completamente inútil na indústria de caçadores, sem quaisquer qualidades de destaque. No entanto, ele luta ferozmente para sustentar seu irmão mais novo doente.

Um dia fatídico, ele recebe um misterioso smartphone de um ser transcendente dentro de uma masmorra, nomeando-o como gerente de canal de tais seres. Ao se inscrever no canal, ele desbloqueia a habilidade de exercer os poderes dos deuses.

description.en:
Tian Hejin, popularly called as the Iron-Blooded Alliance Leader, wakes up in the body of “Bi Liduan”- the disgrace of his family! His hobby is gambling, and he has been locked in a dark warehouse for a long time. Overnight, Tian Hejin went from being the greatest expert of Jianghu to the worst possible trash.

Let's start from the scratch and accomplish everything I could not achieve in my previous life.
description.pt-br:
Tian Hejin, popularmente conhecido como o Líder da Aliança de Sangue de Ferro, acorda no corpo de “Bi Liduan” – a desgraça de sua família! Seu hobby é apostar, e ele foi trancado em um armazém escuro por muito tempo. Da noite para o dia, Tian Hejin passou de ser o maior especialista de Jianghu para o maior lixo possível.

Vamos começar do zero e realizar tudo o que não pude alcançar em minha vida passada.

altTitles.ja: 無限レベルアップin武林

description.en:
Killed on the battlefield without glory to his name, Yuseong Dan receives an opportunity to grow stronger with a strange quest and level system. But each quest he’s forced to fight only seems to be getting harder and harder. Can he level up enough to avoid the same miserable ending and become the powerful hero he wishes to be?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ja:
ここは努力したぶん強くなれる世界

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ko:
재능도 없고 출신도 비천했던 하급무사 단유성, 전쟁터에서 죽다.
하지만 저승인 줄 알고 눈을 떴더니, 어린 시절의 과거로 돌아와 있지 않은가?
이상한 숫자와 문자가 눈 앞에 보이고, 그 지시를 따르면 노력한 만큼 보상을 받기까지 한다.
노력한 만큼의 보상을 받는 세상. 무한레벨업 in 무림에 오신것을 환영합니다.

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ru:
Тан Ю Сон, младший воин, не имевший таланта, с низким уровнем подготовки, погиб на поле боя.

Но когда он открыл глаза, он был сильно удивлён! Он вернулся в свое прошлое, когда ещё был ребёнком! Теперь он может изменить будущее!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.pt-br: Morto no campo de batalha sem glória para seu nome, Yuseong Dan recebe a oportunidade de ficar mais forte com uma estranha missão e sistema de níveis. Mas cada missão que ele é forçado a lutar parece estar ficando cada vez mais difícil. Ele pode subir de nível o suficiente para evitar o mesmo final miserável e se tornar o herói poderoso que deseja ser?

title.en: I'll Resign and Have a Fresh Start in This World

altTitles.en: I'm Going To Relax in This World After Submitting My Resignation
Resigning and Healing in Another World

description.en:
The main character, Cho Isu, lived an ordinary but happy life.
Five years ago, he suddenly loses his parents, and becomes a devastated man, as he struggles every day.
When he was exhausted from the suffocating daily life, a portal opened in the room. A place he has never been to, a place he doesn’t know what might be.
A healing life to enjoy in a different world starting as a commoner and turning into a feudal lord.

title.en: The Gardener in a Hunter World

description.en:
Ji-ha, the weakest labor-class hunter with neither skill nor fighting ability, made a living by running a store while holding the lowest hunter rank.

But one day, his life as a hunter changed when he entered a garden from a different dimension through his dream...

<You have obtained Friendly Plant Lv.1> <You have obtained Blessing of XXX Lv.1>

'I gained a skill just by planting one twig...?'

His unique adventure as the sole gardener in the hunter world begins.

title.en: Healing Life Through Camping In Another World

altTitles.es-la: Acampando en otro Mundo: buscandole el sazon a la vida

description.en: The Star chef, KangHyun, hid in a quite countryside after losing his sense of taste where he found A pathway to another world in his grandfather's house. Since he was on the run anyway, he planned on enjoying a relaxing camp life, but... the people in the other world keep growing interested in KangHyun! Will KangHyun really be able to heal through experiencing a slow life?

Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

title.en: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life

altTitles.ja: おっさん底辺治癒士と愛娘の辺境ライフ ～中年男が回復スキルに覚醒して、英雄へ成り上がる～

altTitles.en: The Frontier Life of The Low-Class Ossan Healer And The Lovely Girl
The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Old Man Healer and His Beloved Daughter
Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~

description.en: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
description.ja: Fランクの治癒士、レダ・ディクソン(30)は、年齢を理由にパーティーから追放されてしまう。傷心のレダは心機一転、田舎町・アムルスへの移住を決意。その道中で、みすぼらしい恰好をしたブロンドヘアの少女・ミナと出会う。アムルスで、少女とともに新生活を始めたレダは、無自覚チートだった『回復魔法』のおかげで町民から“先生”と呼ばれる存在までに!二人は様々なトラブルを解決するとともに、家族の絆を深めていく―。
description.ru: Рэда Диксон, 30 летний лекарь F ранга, который был отстранен от службы из-за возраста. От безысходности он решает переехать в Загородную деревушку Амурт для того, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. По стечениям обстоятельств он встречает Мину, маленькую девочку со светлыми волосами, одетую в одни лохмотья. Родителей у нее нет, поэтому добродушный Рэда становится ей опекуном. Благодаря магии исцеления Рэды, все в поселке называют его "Сенсеем". Рэда и его семья вместе решают проблемы и укрепляют семейные связи.

altTitles.ja: アトリ マイ ディア モーメンツ

description.en: “ATRI -My Dear Moments- is a popular novel game. This work, which boasts strong popularity both domestically and internationally, has been adapted into a comic by Jako with a transparent touch. In a calm town sinking into the sea, the “unforgettable summer” of a boy and a robot girl begins.”
description.vi:
Một phần của nền văn minh loài người đã bị nuốt chửng bởi sự dâng cao bất thường của mực nước biển, nguyên nhân vẫn chưa được làm sáng tỏ. Ikaruga Natsuki, cậu bé mồ côi mẹ và mất một chân trong tai nạn, trở về quê nhà sau nhiều năm sống khổ cực tại thành phố lớn. Tuy nhiên, khi về đến nơi, tất cả những gì cậu thấy chỉ là căn nhà cũ đã bị ngập dưới nước. Cậu không còn ai thân thuộc, chỉ có chiếc tàu và tàu ngầm do bà để lại, cùng với một khoản nợ lớn phải trả.

Cơ hội duy nhất để Natsuki lấy lại ước mơ về tương lai là nhận lời mời của Catherine - kẻ thu nợ đáng ngờ. Họ cùng nhau đi tìm kho báu trong phòng thí nghiệm dưới biển của bà Natsuki, nơi có tin đồn bà đã giấu một điều gì đó quý giá. Nhưng khi đến nơi, họ không tìm thấy tiền bạc hay đá quý, thay vào đó là một cô gái kỳ lạ đang ngủ say trong quan tài. Cô ấy tên là Atri.

Atri là một người máy, nhưng cô sở hữu vẻ ngoài và cảm xúc như một con người thật sự. Cô biết ơn Natsuki vì đã giải thoát mình khỏi quan tài, và nói với cậu:

"Em muốn hoàn thành ý nguyện cuối cùng của chủ nhân. Cho đến lúc đó, em sẽ là chân của anh!"

Trong thị trấn nhỏ dần chìm trong biển, một mùa hè đáng nhớ sắp diễn ra với cậu bé và cô gái người máy bí ẩn...

altTitles.ja: 凡骨新兵のモンスターライフ

altTitles.en: The Monstrous New Life of the Fallen Empire's Recruit

altTitles.ja: 凡骨新兵のモンスターライフ@COMIC

description.en:
The protagonist is an ordinary soldier from an empire at war who gets used as a guinea pig for genetic engineering experiments, turned into a monster and put into cryosleep.

200 years later he wakes up in a sword and sorcery world. The empire is gone and he has to survive alone in the body of a monster whom everybody wants to kill on sight. Meanwhile he encounters various pretty ladies (and elves) in need of rescue.

[Original JP Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6204gb/)

title.en: Rebirth in the End Times: I Reached the Top by Opening Boxes

altTitles.zh: 末世重生：我靠开箱子问鼎巅峰

description.en:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

title.en: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!

description.en: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.

title.en: Watashi, 2-banme no Kanojo de Ii kara

altTitles.ja: わたし、二番目の彼女でいいから。

altTitles.en: I'm Fine with Being the Second Girlfriend

description.en:
Kirishima and Hayasaka are two classmates who have a secret relationship in the public eye.

In their school life they act as if they do not know each other, but secretly, there is much more than people can imagine. Both of them get into a relationship that becomes difficult to break and ends up being impure, unhealthy and complicated since the relationship between them was nothing more than a fling that simply generated a love triangle before Kirishima’s first love and second love.
 
---

**Links:**
- [Official LN (JP)](https://dengekibunko.jp/product/nibanmenokanojo)
description.ja:
俺たちは「二番目」同士で付き合っている――危険な三角関係の行方は？

「私も桐島くんのこと、二番目に好き」

　俺と早坂さんは互いに一番好きな人がいるのに、二番目同士で付き合っている。
　それでも、確かに俺と早坂さんは恋人だ。一緒に帰って、こっそり逢って、人には言えないことをする。
　だけど二番目はやっぱり二番目だから、もし一番好きな人と両想いになれたときは、この関係は解消する。そんな約束をしていた。
　そのはずだったのに――

「ごめんね。私、バカだから、どんどん好きになっちゃうんだ」

　お互いに一番好きな人に近づけたのに、それでも俺たちはどんどん深みにはまって、歯止めがきかなくて、どうしても、お互いを手放せなくなって……。
　もう取り返しがつかない、１００％危険で、不純で、不健全な、こじれた恋の結末は。

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

title.en: I Have a Second Chance at Life, so I’ll Pamper My Yandere Boyfriend for a Happy Ending!!

altTitles.ja: 人生２周目はヤンデレ彼氏を甘やかしてハッピーエンドになります!!

altTitles.es: Tengo una Segunda Oportunidad en la Vida, así que consentiré a mi Novio Yandere para tener un Final Feliz!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Jinsei 2-Shuume wa Yandere Kareshi wo Amayakashite Happy End ni Narimasu!!

description.en:
She must avoid dying in her second chance at life?!
A choose-wisely romantic comedy! ☆

On the day of her high school graduation, Ichinose Himari was shoved off to her death by her boyfriend, Taniguchi Shion... At least, that's what she thought, but when she woke up, she had gone back to when she was a second year student! To avoid dying by Shion's hands again, Himari thinks of a solution - - and that solution is to completely show Shion how she feels about him!

Himari's series of unfortunate events begins!
A salaryman summons Astaroth, a Prince of Hell, to help him stop getting bullied at work.

altTitles.ja: 無籍者

description.en: Im Hwapyung. A man who wants to live a normal life like his name. Everything he had in his mundane life was destroyed. [Your love has become my loathing.] You shouldn’t have messed with me in the first place. You should have just let me live a quiet life. And now he has began his move that none of his nemesis will survive his wrath.

title.en: Watashi no Ue ni Ukabu "Akuyaki Reijou (Hametsu suru)" tte Nandeshou ka?

altTitles.ja: 私の上に浮かぶ『悪役令嬢(破滅する)』ってなんでしょうか？

altTitles.en: What does "Villainess (Doomed)" floating above my head mean?

description.en:
While attempting to do good deeds, she seemed to have entered the prince's doting route!

Louise, the count's daughter, for some unknown reason, can see letters above people's heads. Written above her own head are the words, "Villainess (doomed)." To change that, Louise aims to be a good-natured noblewoman. However, when she is pressed by Sylvile and tells him truthfully that his descriptor reads, "Love interest: Second Prince (Easy)" his interest is piqued and they become betrothed. Furthermore, he offers her a promise, "To make you feel at ease, I'll show you that I can change my descriptor."

In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

title.en: That One Classmate Makes Me Question My Own Masculinity

description.en: Just a story of a strong boy and an even stronger girl. Everyone want to be protected, right?

The cute and funny adventures of a boy and his best friend.  
  
Note: The story starts at chapter 42. The earlier chapters contain insert art of the characters by the author.
description.pl: Opowieść o przygodach czwórki przyjaciół. Zbieżność w numeracji rozdziałów wynika z zastosowania odmiennego niż angielska grupa systemu liczbowania dodatków – tłumaczenia są mniej więcej na tym samym etapie.
description.zh: 幼儿园里的一次合影是见一、展正希一辈子情谊的起点。一起长大的发小在校园里又遇见了贺天、莫关山这些好朋友。《19天》不仅仅是四人轻松愉快的校园日常，也是男孩们相互理解帮助最终成长的青春物语。

description.en:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

Having never done anything bad and lived a dilligent life, Shushu is suddenly framed for murder and imprisoned in a prison for women.
In order to survive amongst harsh and vicious criminals.

“W-Will you be my prison wife?”

She becomes the wife of her very pretty but very scary roommate, who is also the prettiest(?) girl in the prison, Minicat.

But something is weird.

Why is she suddenly having the kind of feelings she would have for a man for this beautiful Minicat instead?

“It’s a rule, cabbage. Close your eyes when we kiss and I’ll treat you nicely.”

title.en: There's a Rat in Our House

altTitles.en: There Is a Mouse in My House
There's a Mouse in my House

description.en: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space

altTitles.ja: 異世界勇者ミズキ

description.en:
A completely ordinary girl gets summoned into another world to become the hero.  
Hilarity ensues.  
  
Note: Is actually a 3-koma

Chapter 88 is the end of the original serialization, with the continuing chapters being released on the mangaka's Fanbox page (https://kimuramatsuri.fanbox.cc/posts).
description.id:
Seorang gadis yang benar - benar biasa saja dipanggil ke dunia lain untuk menjadi pahlawan.  
Kemeriahan pun terjadi.  
  
Note: Ini sebenernya 3-koma  
  
[Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/4890179)  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kmatsuri888)

title.en: I Can't Get Enough of You

altTitles.en: I Can’t Wait To Eat You

description.en: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet ‘Han So-eun’, the daughter of the driver who took his parents’ lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... “I think the director likes..."
description.fr:
Des capacités exceptionnelles. Une belle apparence qui ne passera pas inaperçue. Une famille aisée. Une vie sur un chemin bien tracé. Tout était ennuyeux et parfait. Jusqu'au jour où, à trente ans, Kim Tae-joon quitte impulsivement la route.
Rencontrer Han So-eun, la fille du chauffeur qui a coûté la vie à ses parents.
« Comment diable êtes-vous entré dans cette entreprise en tant qu'étranger ?
J'étais dégoûté par son impudeur, alors j'ai décidé de la garder et de la tourmenter. Comme quelqu'un qui n'en a jamais assez de toi....
"Je pense que j'aime le réalisateur."
Oh non.

description.en:
If you cannot remember, listen to your body.
If anyone discovers that slave master Ananse has lost her memory, she will be killed. So to save herself, she ropes in Solteo, a slave who hates her beyond compare. Her proposal? "Help me uphold my old image, and you'll be freed." His reply? "I'll make you regret ever requesting that, my master."
description.ko:
“눈 뜨세요, 아난시 님. 이 일을 허락한 건 당신입니다.”
“아읏…! 미안….”
“아까 말씀 드렸을 텐데요. 주인은 노예에게 절대 사과하지 않습니다.”

파 제국 최대 규모의 노예 상단주이자 희대의 악녀인 아난시.
어느 날 모든 기억을 잃은 채 눈을 뜬 그녀는 살아남기 위하여
자신의 노예, 솔테오에게 위험한 거래를 제안한다.
기억을 잃은 자신을 돕는다면 그를 풀어주겠노라고.

위험한 욕망과 뒤틀린 집착 속 자신을 둘러싼 비밀을 쫓는 한 여자의 이야기,
<그 노예들의 사육법>

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.hu: Még akkor is, ha a kétségbeesés megvisel

description.en:
Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?
